```yaml
# sample job template for processing a partition
# partition_id is a placeholder for the partition id
# partitions would be generated by custom python controller that would create a job for each partition
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: etl-job-partition-{{PARTITION_ID}}
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: etl
        image: finopsfoundation/focus-converter:latest
        env:
        - name: PARTITION_ID
          value: "{{PARTITION_ID}}"
      restartPolicy: Never # [kubernetes]
  backoffLimit: 2
```
